name: Handlebars
post:
This app is created with Handlebars. Since I made this app in April 2021, I've learned React. 
 
 Revisiting this app after having learned React, I can see that Handlebars was likely an important precursor to frameworks like React, though I don't think I'm likely to use Handlebars again. I like the straightforward separation of concerns in React. For instance, it's nice to be able to write all of the component-relevant JavaScript and JSX in the same file with the CSS being in a separate file in the same folder. 
 
 Nevertheless, my knowledge of React and Handlebars is limited, and there may be very good reasons to use Handlebars over React in some instances.
